name: Balling Bazooka Bot!
description:
PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS VERSION BELOW FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE!

Description

This is a physics based game where the player takes control of the rocket totting robot called “bot” who is trying to escape from a robotics lab  

The Goal of game is not only to defeat enemy robots but to move bot with not just traditional controls like W,A,S,D and Jumping but also through shooting the bazooka to bounce him and objects in the environment around.

Controls

WASD to Move, Space to Jump, B to Slow down, Left Click to Shoot, Right Click to Aim, R to Restart

Credits

  • Vedanth Panchoo - Lead Programmer, Engine Manager, Physics Manager, Animator, Main Character Modeller, Rigger and Level Designer
  • Malakai Mathins - NPC and Weapons Modeller
  • Rory Boyd - Particle Manager, Text Editor and Thumbnail artist
  • Thabang Sizwe Zulu - Character Concept Artist and Toon Shader Programmer
  • Annah Ngoakoana Mokono - Background Designer
